28.title: Violence Jack
28.plot: The Sage gets ready to review Violence Jack... but finds he simply doesn't have the heart nor the stomach to do so. Despite all the horrifically violent, profane and sexual Anime he's reviewed in the past, Violence Jack is the worst offender because it has no camp value. The Sage draws the line at Violence Jack. But he promised the fans. With help from Marc the Engineer, Sage manages to do something of a review, even if it narrowly destroys him.

imdb.title: Anime Abandon
plot: A philosophical masochist reviews Anime films of the most bizarre caliber, ranging from horrifically violent to borderline pornographic to just plain crazy.::Anonymous
